title: Femtosecond laser micromachining in transparent materials
title_cn: 飞秒激光微加工透明材料
abstract: Femtosecond laser micromachining can be used either to remove materials or to change a material's properties, and can be applied to both absorptive and transparent substances. Over the past decade, this technique has been used in a broad range of applications, from waveguide fabrication to cell ablation. This review describes the physical mechanisms and the main experimental parameters involved in the femtosecond laser micromachining of transparent materials, and important emerging applications of the technology.
abstract_cn: 飞秒激光微加工可用于去除材料或更改材料的特性，并可应用于吸收性和透明性物质。 在过去的十年中，从波导制造到单元烧蚀，该技术已被广泛应用。 本文综述了飞秒激光微加工透明材料所涉及的物理机理和主要实验参数，以及该技术的重要新兴应用。</ p>

title: Nanometre-scale germanium photodetector enhanced by a near-infrared dipole antenna
title_cn: 近红外偶极子天线增强纳米级锗光电探测器
abstract: A critical challenge for the convergence of optics and electronics is that the micrometre scale of optics is significantly larger than the nanometre scale of modern electronic devices. In the conversion from photons to electrons by photodetectors, this size incompatibility often leads to substantial penalties in power dissipation, area, latency and noise. A photodetector can be made smaller by using a subwavelength active region; however, this can result in very low responsivity because of the diffraction limit of the light. Here we exploit the idea of a half-wave Hertz dipole antenna (length ∼ 380 nm) from radio waves, but at near-infrared wavelengths (length ∼ 1.3 µm), to concentrate radiation into a nanometre-scale germanium photodetector. This gives a polarization contrast of a factor of 20 in the resulting photocurrent in the subwavelength germanium element, which has an active volume of 0.00072 µm3, a size that is two orders of magnitude smaller than previously demonstrated detectors at such wavelengths.
abstract_cn: 光学和电子学融合的一个关键挑战是光学学的微米级尺度明显大于现代电子设备的纳米尺度。在通过光电探测器将光子转换为电子的过程中，这种尺寸不兼容通常会导致功耗，面积，等待时间和噪声的重大损失。通过使用亚波长有源区可以使光电检测器更小。然而，由于光的衍射极限，这可能导致非常低的响应度。在这里，我们利用无线电波中的半波赫兹偶极子天线（长度为380 nm）（但波长为近红外波长（长度为＆＃8764; 1.3＆＃181; m））将辐射集中到纳米级锗光电探测器。这在亚波长锗元素中产生的光电流中提供了20倍的极化对比度，该元素的有效体积为0.00072＆＃181; m 3 ，其大小减小了两个数量级。比以前展示的探测器在这种波长下要好。

title: Nanomechanical control of an optical antenna
title_cn: 光学天线的纳米机械控制
abstract: Resonant optical nanoantennas hold great promise for applications in physics and chemistry. Their operation relies on their ability to concentrate light on spatial scales much smaller than the wavelength. In this work, we mechanically tune the length and gap between two triangles comprising a single gold bow-tie antenna by precise nanomanipulation with the tip of an atomic force microscope. At the same time, the optical response of the nanostructure is determined by means of dark-field scattering spectroscopy. We find no unique single ‘antenna resonance’. Instead, the plasmon mode splits into two dipole resonances for gap sizes on the order of a few tens of nanometres, governed by the full three-dimensional shape of the antenna arms. This result opens the door to new nano-optomechanical devices, where mechanical changes on the nanometre scale control the optical properties of artificial structures.
abstract_cn: 谐振光学纳米天线在物理和化学领域的应用前景广阔。 它们的操作依赖于它们将光集中在远小于波长的空间尺度上的能力。 在这项工作中，我们通过用原子力显微镜的尖端进行精确的纳米处理，对包含单个金领结天线的两个三角形之间的长度和间隙进行机械调整。 同时，借助于暗场散射光谱法确定纳米结构的光学响应。 我们发现没有唯一的“天线谐振”。 取而代之的是，等离子激元模式分裂成两个偶极子谐振，其间隙大小约为几十纳米，这取决于天线臂的完整三维形状。 这一结果为新型纳米光学机械设备打开了大门，其中纳米级的机械变化控制着人造结构的光学特性。

title: Optical antennas direct single-molecule emission
title_cn: 光学天线直接发射单分子
abstract: Antennas have been used for more than a century to control the emission and collection of radio and microwave radiation. An optical analogue is of great interest as it will allow unique control of absorption and emission at the nanometre scale. Despite the intense recent research on optical antennas, one of the main functions of traditional antennas, the directing of radiation, remains a challenge at optical frequencies. Here we experimentally demonstrate control of the emission direction of individual molecules by reversible coupling to an optical monopole antenna. We show how the angular emission of the coupled system is determined by the dominant antenna mode—that is, the antenna design—regardless of molecular orientation. This result reveals the role of the plasmon mode in the emission process and provides a clear guideline how to exploit the large available library of radio antennas to direct emission in nano-optical microscopy, spectroscopy and light-emitting devices, including single-photon sources.
abstract_cn: 天线已经使用了一个多世纪，用以控制无线电和微波辐射的发射和收集。光学类似物引起了极大的兴趣，因为它将允许对纳米级的吸收和发射进行独特的控制。尽管最近对光学天线进行了广泛的研究，但是传统天线的主要功能之一，即辐射的定向，在光学频率上仍然是一个挑战。在这里，我们通过实验证明了通过与光学单极天线可逆耦合来控制单个分子的发射方向。我们展示了耦合系统的角发射如何由主导天线模式确定，即天线设计与分子取向无关。该结果揭示了等离激元模式在发射过程中的作用，并为如何利用大型可用的无线电天线库在纳米光学显微镜，光谱学和发光设备（包括单光子源）中定向发射提供了明确的指导。

title: Observation of two-photon emission from semiconductors
title_cn: 观察半导体的双光子发射
abstract: Two-photon emission is a process in which electron transition between quantum levels occurs through the simultaneous emission of two photons. This phenomenon is important for astrophysics and atomic physics, and semiconductor two-photon emission was recently proposed as a compact source of entangled photons, essential for practical quantum information processing, and three orders of magnitude more efficient than the existing down-conversion schemes. Two-photon absorption in semiconductors has been extensively investigated; however, spontaneous semiconductor two-photon emission has not been observed, nor has it been fully analysed theoretically so far. We report the first experimental observations of two-photon emission from semiconductors and develop a corresponding theory. Spontaneous two-photon emission is demonstrated in optically pumped bulk GaAs and in electrically driven GaInP/AlGaInP quantum wells. Singly stimulated two-photon emission measurements demonstrate the theoretically predicted two-photon optical gain in semiconductors—a necessary ingredient for any realizations of future two-photon semiconductor lasers. A photon-coincidence experiment is presented to validate the simultaneity of the electrically driven GaInP/AlGaInP two-photon emission, limited only by the detector's temporal resolution.
abstract_cn: 双光子发射是通过同时发射两个光子在量子能级之间发生电子跃迁的过程。该现象对于天体物理学和原子物理学很重要，最近提出了半导体双光子发射作为纠缠光子的紧凑源，对于实际的量子信息处理必不可少，并且比现有的下变频方案效率高三个数量级。半导体中的双光子吸收已被广泛研究。但是，至今尚未观察到自发的半导体双光子发射，也没有在理论上进行全面分析。我们报告了半导体双光子发射的第一个实验观察结果，并发展了相应的理论。在光泵浦体GaAs和电驱动的GaInP / AlGaInP量子阱中证明了自发双光子发射。单激发双光子发射测量结果证明了理论上半导体中的双光子光学增益，这是将来实现双光子半导体激光器的任何必要手段。进行了光子重合实验，以验证电驱动的GaInP / AlGaInP双光子发射的同时性，仅受探测器的时间分辨率限制。

title: High-throughput silicon nanophotonic wavelength-insensitive switch for on-chip optical networks
title_cn: 用于芯片上光网络的高通量硅纳米光子波长不敏感开关
abstract: Recent advances in silicon nanophotonics, including demonstrations of ultracompact modulators, germanium waveguide photodetectors and wavelength-division multiplexers, indicate the feasibility of on-chip optical interconnects integrated with multicore microprocessors. Studies have suggested that direct replacement of part or all of the electrical interconnect wiring with point-to-point optical links may not provide sufficient power savings to make this approach attractive to chip designers. However, if high-bandwidth optical signals can be switched and routed using an on-chip silicon nanophotonic interconnection network, significant performance gains can be expected. Here we show an ultracompact (40 × 12 µm2) wavelength-insensitive switch based on cascaded silicon microring resonators, which may bring this vision closer to reality by serving as a critical basic element for scalable on-chip optical networks. Fast (<2 ns) error-free (bit error rate < 1 × 10−12) switching of multiple (up to 9) 40-Gbit s−1 optical channels is demonstrated in a temperature-insensitive (±15 °C) device.
abstract_cn: 硅纳米光子技术的最新进展，包括超紧凑型调制器，锗波导光电探测器和波分复用器的演示，表明了与多核微处理器集成的片上光学互连的可行性。研究表明，用点对点光链路直接替换部分或全部电气互连布线可能无法节省足够的功率，从而无法使这种方法对芯片设计者有吸引力。但是，如果可以使用片上硅纳米光子互连网络来交换和路由高带宽光信号，则可以期望获得显着的性能提升。在这里，我们展示了基于级联硅微环谐振器的超紧凑型（40＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 12＆＃160;＆＃181; m 2 ）波长不敏感开关，它可能带来通过将其用作可扩展片上光网络的关键基本要素，这一愿景将更加接近现实。快速（＆lt;＆lt;＆＃160; ns＆＃160; ns）＆＃8482;（误码率＆lt;＆＃160; 1＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 ＆＃8722; 12 ）切换在温度不敏感（＆＃177; 15＆＃160;＆＃176; C）设备中演示了多个（最多9个）40 Gb s ＆＃8722; 1 光通道中的一个。 / p>

title: Colloidal quantum-dot light-emitting diodes with metal-oxide charge transport layers
title_cn: 具有金属氧化物电荷传输层的胶体量子点发光二极管
abstract: Colloidal quantum dots, with their tunable luminescence properties, are uniquely suited for use as lumophores in light-emitting devices for display technologies and large-area planar lighting. In contrast to epitaxially grown quantum dots, colloidal quantum dots can be synthesized as highly monodisperse colloids and solution deposited over large areas into densely packed, solid-state multilayers, which have shown promise as efficient optical gain media. To be a viable platform for colour-tunable electrically pumped lasers, the present-generation quantum-dot LEDs must be modified to withstand the extended, high-current-density operation needed to achieve population inversion. This requirement necessitates a quantum-dot LED design that incorporates robust charge transport layers. Here we report the use of sputtered, amorphous inorganic semiconductors as robust charge transport layers and demonstrate devices capable of operating at current densities exceeding 3.5 A cm−2 with peak brightness of 1,950 Cd m−2 and maximum external electroluminescence efficiency of nearly 0.1%, which represents a 100-fold improvement over previously reported structures.
abstract_cn: 胶体量子点具有可调节的发光特性，特别适合用作显示技术和大面积平面照明的发光设备中的荧光体。与外延生长的量子点相反，胶体量子点可以合成为高度单分散的胶体，并且可以将溶液沉积在大面积上，成为致密堆积的固态多层体，这已被证明是有效的光学增益介质。为了成为可调色电泵浦激光器的可行平台，必须对当前的量子点LED进行修改，以承受实现种群反转所需的扩展的高电流密度操作。为了满足这一要求，需要结合坚固的电荷传输层的量子点LED设计。在这里，我们报告了使用溅射的非晶态无机半导体作为坚固的电荷传输层，并演示了能够以超过峰值电流3.5＆＃160; cm ＆＃8722; 2 的电流密度运行的器件1,950＆＃160; Cd＆＃160; m ＆＃8722; 2 的亮度和近0.1％的最大外部电致发光效率，比以前报道的结构提高了100倍。
